title: The Croissant Crusader: Sweet Dust Poof!
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed, absurd resolution, classic Comic Book style, 16:9 aspect ratio. A dynamic scene featuring a handsome, muscular baker wearing a crisp white toque and apron, smiling intensely while energetically dusting a huge pile of golden croissants with powdered sugar from a metal sieve. Dramatic sugar splash effect creating a white cloud. Bold black ink outlines, classic comic book shading (hatching and cross-hatching), vibrant flat colors, high contrast, and dynamic action pose. Includes comic book sound effects 'POOFF!' and a speech bubble reading 'SWEET DUST!'. Background features a busy artisan bakery interior, including a traditional brick oven with visible fire and shelves loaded with assorted breads and pastries.
